name: Mr Felix Fox iPad Case
description:
Mr. Felix Fox is funny little fellow. When all the other foxes were out learning how to hunt, he was learning how to use Photoshop. He loves a good cup of Earl Gray de la Creme Tea, and he HATES the sunshine — that's why he's migrated to my funny little workshop here in Portland, Oregon. 

This case is for the iPad (2nd-4th generation).  Mr. Fox is custom made for you!  Please allow 2-7 days for your felt friend to be lovingly handmade before being shipped to you.

International shipping is available. Please contact us for shipping rates

name: Mr Albert Owl iPad mini Case
description:
Albert is a mild mannered owl. He can often be found knitting little socks, which he gives as peace offerings to mice. Unfortunately, they often mistake him swooping down in their direction as attacks, but he just wants to be friends; Albert is a vegetarian so he has no interest in eating mice. He lives in a tall old pine tree in Forest Park in Northwest Portland.

This is a case for the iPad mini. Albert is custom made for you!  Please allow 2-7 days for your felt friend to be lovingly handmade before being shipped to you. 

International shipping is available. Please contact us for shipping rates.

name: Mr. Archibald Raccoon iPad mini Case
description:
Archibald is a serious sort. He is currently studying experimental physics at Woodland University. When he's not in the lab you can usually find him locating the perfect cup of locally roasted coffee. He is also known to keep a blog about the scientific impossibilities in comic books. 


This case is for the iPad mini.  Mr. Raccoon is custom made for you!  Please allow 2-7 days for your felt friend to be lovingly handmade before being shipped to you.

International shipping is available. Please contact us for rates.

name: Mr. Vanilla Polar iPad mini Case
description:
Vanilla lives in the vast tundra of Antartica, but every winter ventures down to Portland to spend a few months with his brown and black bear cousins. Every Sunday they have brunch at a different local diner, and every afternoon they have tea in there cave. Whenever Vanilla is in town he loves to stop by the workshop and brush up on his woodworking skills.  

This is a case for the iPad mini. Vanilla is custom made for you!  Please allow 2-7 days for your felt friend to be lovingly handmade before being shipped to you.

International Shipping is available. Please contact us for shipping rates.
